remarks: Properties that determine a bounded linear operator.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Jan-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isblo3i.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
isblo3i.m $e |- M = ( normCV ` U ) $.
isblo3i.n $e |- N = ( normCV ` W ) $.
isblo3i.4 $e |- L = ( U LnOp W ) $.
isblo3i.5 $e |- B = ( U BLnOp W ) $.
isblo3i.u $e |- U e. NrmCVec $.
isblo3i.w $e |- W e. NrmCVec $.
blo3i $p |- ( ( T e. L /\ A e. RR /\ A. y e. X ( N ` ( T ` y ) ) <_ ( A x. ( M ` y ) ) ) -> T e. B ) $.

$d B y $.
